title: No Fee, Green, large, cat friendly, Arboretum/Forest Hills
posting_body: Great condition, easy walk to Forest Hills, JP, birds and flowering trees of Arnold Arboretum, Rozzie sq., Brookline, Boston, Needham
BEAT THE HIGH PRICES OF JAMAICA PLAIN:
NO FEE,
SIZE:
Large, bright, open, high ceilings
KITCHEN: Full Eat-in Kitchen with large pantry and porch
BATH: standard, free washing machine and dryer
BEDROOMS: 3 Comfortable spaced-out Bedrooms for privacy
HEAT/HW: gas – no utilities included in rent
Hardwood FLOORS and tiles, no carpet.
PORCHES Back and front
PARKING: driveway use by separate agreement and shared with other 2 apartments in the building
PETS: cats only, NO Dogs
YARD back yard for summer activities
Well maintained, professionally managed.
Responsible landlord
Good Credit references needed.
3 br.
voucher accepted.
Rent if shared with 3 residents per lease.
$200 for each additional occupant.
Non-smoking apartment

Send an e-mail and please tell me more about you and your circumstances:  when do you need it, how many people, for how long, why this place, your budget, your voucher size.... etc...so as to see if this house would meet your needs.
TRANSPORTATION: Walk to Forest Hills T, buses to Dedham and Boston.
Downtown Boston in less than 20 minutes!
Cordially,
